lines.gurmukhi: swgr mQq jYsy inksy AMimRq ibKu; praupkwr n ibkwr smsir hY [

Unknown.translation: Churning of ocean produced nectar and poison. Despite coming out of the same ocean, the goodness of nectar and harm of poison is not the same.

lines.gurmukhi: ibKu Acvq hoq rqn ibnws kwl; Acey AMimRq mUey jIvq Amr hY [

Unknown.translation: Poison ends the jewel-like life whereas nectar resuscitates or revives the dead making him immortal.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kÎoˆik rqn rUp huMidAwˆ BI ivhu zihr qwˆ Acvdy Kwˆdy swr hI mOq dw smwˆ ilAw FukOˆdI hY pr AMimRq Acey pIiqAwˆ mey hoey BI Amr mOq rihq jIaUx nUM pRwpq ho jwˆdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qwro qwrI eyk lost sY pRgt huie; bMD moK pdvI sMswr ibsQr hY [

Unknown.translation: As the key and the lock are made of the same metal, but a lock results in bondage whereas a key frees the bonds.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI AswD swD sn Aau mjIT giq; gurmiq durmiq tyvsY n tr hY [162[

Unknown.translation: Similarly a man does not give up his base wisdom but a person of Godly disposition never falters from the wisdom and teachings of the Guru. (162)
